item.title: My Favorite Open-Source Projects
item.description:
Open-source projects power the world of technology! Here are a few of my favorites:

  • VS Code - A lightweight and powerful code editor.
  • React - Build dynamic user interfaces.
  • Linux - The backbone of modern servers.

Why Contribute to Open Source?

  • Learn new skills.
  • Collaborate with talented developers.
  • Make an impact on the community.

What are your favorite open-source projects?
